c8c007d","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://42c3f68feca6d494bdd85f62a58ce8b1c48bd5e8de1a33b8de248f6d9ce86566","dweb:/ipfs/QmbFQi7RZ1abbwyS6SwVVeuXxvinMkVKi1up9N9PR66DiP"]}},"version":1}

constructor.details: Initiated by Saloon._deployStrategyIfNeeded() => StrategyFactory.deployStrategy()Includes Saloon commission + hunter payout

params._owner: Owner of this contract. Contracts deployed through pipeline will be owned by Saloon.sol

depositToStrategy().details: Add liquidity to stargate router => receive LP tokens => deposit LP tokens into stargate LPStaking

params._STG: The STG token contract. There is currently a governance proposal to redeploy STG token due to Alameda connection.
params._stargateLPStaking: The staking contract used to stake Stargate LP tokens.
params._stargateLPToken: The LP Token that is provided as a result of adding liquidity.
params._stargateRouter: The router contract used for adding and removing liquidity.

params._swapRouter: The router contract used for swapping tokens.

withdrawFromStrategy(uint256).details: Automatically converts pending yield to deposit token and sends entire contract balance.

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to withdraw from strategy.

withdrawYield().details: 10% Saloon fee automatically taken when converting yield to deposit token.

compound().notice: Convert pending reward into deposit token and deposit.

constructor.notice: Constructs the strategy contract. Sets proper addresses and approvals.

depositToStrategy().notice: Put all deposit tokens held in this contract to work.

pendingRewardBalance().notice: The amount of pending token owed to this contract due to deposit.

rewardBalance().notice: The balance of yield tokens currently in the contract.

updateStargateAddresses(address,address,.notice: Update any or all of the necessary stargate addresses.

updateSwapRouterAddress(address).notice: Update the Uniswap router address used to swap STG for deposit token.

withdrawFromStrategy(uint256).notice: Withdraw deposited LP from staking contract, remove liquidity, and send to caller

withdrawYield().notice: Withdraw all pending yield from strategy to caller.

documentation.text:
@notice Update the Uniswap router address used to swap STG for deposit token.
 @param _swapRouter The router contract used for swapping tokens.

@notice Put all deposit tokens held in this contract to work.
 @dev Add liquidity to stargate router => receive LP tokens => deposit LP tokens into stargate LPStaking
@notice Convert pending reward into deposit token and deposit.

@notice Withdraw all pending yield from strategy to caller.
 @dev 10% Saloon fee automatically taken when converting yield to deposit token.
@notice The balance of yield tokens currently in the contract.
@notice The amount of pending token owed to this contract due to deposit.
